    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/634</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El món per un forat. Societat: el mercat</string>
            <string language="en">"The world through a keyhole". Markets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"die Welt durch ein Schlüsselloch". 
Märkte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"le monde par un trou de la serrure". 
Marchés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"o mundo através de um buraco da fechadura". 
Mercados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"il mondo attraverso un buco della serratura". 
Mercati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Ο κόσμος μέσω μιας κλειδαρότρυπασ". Αγορές</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Capítol de la sèrie "El món per un forat" que tracta del mercat i de les parades que s'hi troben, els personatges i els productes. Conté un vídeo amb imatge real, fotos amb imatges del vídeo, sons, dibuixos per imprimir i pintar, diverses activitats d'aprenentatge i lúdiques...</string>
            <string language="en">A chapter in the series "The World through a Keyhole" on markets, stalls, stallholders and products. It includes a live video, stills from the video, sounds, drawings to print and colour, and different learning activities and games.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comerç</string>
            <string language="en">commerce</string>
            <string language="es">comercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sector serveis</string>
            <string language="en">services</string>
            <string language="es">sector servicios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vida social</string>
            <string language="en">social life</string>
            <string language="es">vida social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">socialització</string>
            <string language="en">socialisation</string>
            <string language="es">socialización</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sector terciari</string>
            <string language="en">tertiary sector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciutat</string>
            <string language="en">town</string>
            <string language="es">ciudad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">entorn urbà</string>
            <string language="en">urban environment</string>
            <string language="es">ambiente urbano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Societat</string>
            <string language="en">Society</string>
            <string language="es">Sociedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kapitel in der Serie "die Welt durch ein 
Schlüsselloch" auf Märkten, Ställen, stallholders und Produkten. 
Es schließt einen Phasenbildschirm, Stille vom Bildschirm, 
Töne, Zeichnungen ein, um zu drucken und Farbe und unterschiedliche 
Lernenaktivitäten und -spiele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un chapitre de la série "le monde par un trou de
la serrure" sur des marchés, des stalles, des stallholders et des 
produits. Il inclut un vidéo de phase, des distillateurs du 
vidéo, des bruits, des schémas pour imprimer et couleur, et 
différents étude et jeux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um capítulo na série "o mundo através de um 
buraco da fechadura" em mercados, em tendas, em stallholders e em 
produtos. Inclui um vídeo vivo, destiladores do vídeo, sons, 
desenhos para imprimir e cor, e atividades e jogos diferentes de 
aprendizagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un capitolo in serie "il mondo attraverso un buco
della serratura" sui mercati, sulle stalle, sugli stallholders e sui 
prodotti. Include un video in tensione, alambicchi dal video, 
suoni, illustrazioni per stampare e colore ed attività imparanti e 
giochi differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κεφάλαιο στη σειρά "ο κόσμος μέσω μιας 
κλειδαρότρυπασ" στις αγορές, τους στάβλους, τα stallholders και 
τα προϊόντα. Περιλαμβάνει ένα ζωντανό βίντεο, 
αποστακτήρες από το βίντεο, ήχοι, σχέδια στην τυπωμένη ύλη και 
το χρώμα, και τις διαφορετικά δραστηριότητες και τα παιχνίδια 
εκμάθησης.</string>
          </description>
